==Chinese==

===Glyph origin===
This character is a vertical stacking of {{zh-l|*上|up}} and {{zh-l|*下|down}} with fusion of the horizontal lines, thus representing being squeezed between above and below.

===Etymology 1===
{{zh-forms}}
Maybe cognate with {{och-l|夾|to clip}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{zh-pron
|m=kǎ,qiǎ,1nc=colloquial,2nc=literary
|m-s=qia1/ka1/ka3/qia3
|c=kaa1,kaa2
|h=pfs=khà
|mn=qz,tw:khah/xm,zz:khá/tw:kha̍h
|mn_note=khah/khá - vernacular (俗); kha̍h - 闔 is used in the Mainland
|mc=
|oc=
|ma=
|cat=v,n
}}

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[wedge]]; to [[get]] [[stuck]]; to be [[jammed]]; to become tightly [[wedged]]
#* {{zh-x|魚刺 卡 在 喉嚨 裡。|A fishbone is '''stuck''' in the throat.}}
# to [[clip]]; to [[fasten]]
# to [[scrag]]; to [[choke]]
#* {{zh-x|歹徒 卡 住 他 的 脖子。|The ruffian '''wrung''' his neck.}}
# {{lb|zh|of|_|videos}} to [[freeze up]], to [[buffer]], to stop loading
#: {{zh-x|卡 在 奇怪 的 地方|it stopped (loading) at a strange frame}}
# a [[pin]], a [[fastener]]
#* {{zh-x|髮卡{qiǎ}|hairpin}}
# a [[checkpoint]], a [[checkpost]]
